title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 219/85 of 28 January 1985 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in South Korea
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 219/85
of 28 January 1985
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in South Korea
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Certain Member States' shares of the Community quantitative limits for textile products originating in South Korea, as fixed in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 3589/82, are hereby amended for 1984 as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 January 1985.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 374, 31. 12. 1982, p. 106.
(2) OJ No L 380, 31. 12. 1983, p. 1.
